User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Zenith Planner application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

BMI.title: BMI
BMI.description: Represents a user's Body Mass Index (BMI) data at a point in time.

id.description: Unique identifier for the BMI record.

date.description: The date when the BMI was recorded.

height.description: User's height in meters at the time of recording.

weight.description: User's weight in kilograms at the time of recording.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a single task for a user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the task.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this task.

deadline.description: The deadline for the task as a Firestore Timestamp.

completed.description: Whether the task has been completed.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the task was created.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including BMI-related data. Users can only read/write their own document.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user. This is the Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores historical BMI data for a specific user. Users can only read/write their own BMI records.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

params.name: bmiId
params.description: The unique identifier for the BMI record.

definition.description: Stores tasks for a specific user. Users can only read/write their own tasks.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

params.name: taskId
